sys_ui_message.message: The VMware Workspace ONE ITSM connector enables a seamless integration for your Workspace ONE UEM ITSM needs. The connector enables you to perform common troubleshooting activities like Remote Assist, Device Wipe, Change Passcode and more from right within ServiceNow portal without the need to navigate into the Workspace ONE UEM console. Providing this seamless integration enbles you to simplify the ITSM experience and increase efficiency by allowing you to manage ITSM workflows from within a single portal.
